subject: Guess they want it shared!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_4867_197b_1343
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

Another from last night, this was using linear sweep. I like this method so 
much I might drop the random circuit from future boxes. I stayed up last 
night to add the linear sweep function to an old box.

There's no way I can stop making boxes, I just don't have the resuources to 
supply them to everyone that wants at this time, plus trying ot find waay to 
make the things more better. I am no engineer, and it takes a while to 
figure things out--as with all aspects of this life.

Frank-S
